Mercury Blues.title: Mercury Blues
Mercury Blues.author: David Lindly
Mercury Blues.content:
Instrument: Gitarr Tonart: B-dur

::Vers::Well i[B]f I had the money - I'd tell you what I'd do
I go downtown buy a Mercury or two
::Refräng::[E]Cazy bout a Mercury - Lord I'm cra[B]zy bout a Mercury
I'm gonna [G#m]buy me a Mercury & c[F#]ruise it up & down the [B]road

Well the girl I love - I stole her from a friend
He got lucky stole her back again
She heard he had a Mercury - Lord she's crazy bout a Mercury
I'm gonna buy me a Mercury & cruise it up & down the road

Hey now mama - You look so fine - Driven round in your Mercury 49
Crazy bout a Mercury - Lord I'm crazy bout a Mercury
I'm gonna buy me a Mercury & cruise it up & down the road.

Well my baby went out - Didn't stay long
Bought herself a Mercury, come a cruisen home
She's crazy bout a Mercury - Yeah she's crazy bout a Mercury
I'm gonna buy me a Mercury & cruise it up & down the road
(Ahhh cruise now)

Well if I had money - I'd tell you what I'd do
I go downtown buy a Mercury or two
Crazy bout a Mercury -Lord I'm crazy bout a Mercury
I'm gonna buy me a Mercury & cruise it up & down the road (x3)

Try A Little Tenderness.title: Try A Little Tenderness
Try A Little Tenderness.author: Otis Redding
Try A Little Tenderness.content:
::Vers::[G]Oh she may be [Em]weary
Those [Am7]young girls they do get [D]weary
[G]Wearing that [F]same old shaggy [E7]dress
[Am]But when she gets weary.........[D]
You try a little [G]tenderness [C] ...[G] ..... [D]

::Vers::[G]I know she's [Em]waiting
[Am7]Just antici[D]pating
The [G]thing that you'll [F]never never [E7]possess no no no 
but [Am]while she's there waiting[D]
[D7]Try just a little bit of [G]tenderness [C] ....[G].......[G7]..

::Bridge::[C]Now it's not just senti[B]mental no
But [Em]she has her griefs and [A]cares
[C]But the soft words  they are [B]spoke so gentle
And it makes it [A]easier to [Am7]bear ....[D]...

::Vers::[G]Oh she won't re[Em]gret it, no no
[Am7]Them young girls they don't for[D]get it
[G]Love is their [F]whole happi[E7]ness
[Am]But its all so easy
[D]all you got to do is try
Try a little [G]tenderness [F] ......[E]

::Refräng::[A]Hold her - [B]Squeeze her
[C]Never [C#]leave her - [D]now get [D#]to her
got got got to [E]try a [F]little [F#]tender[G]ness [F] .....[E7]

::Refräng::you've got to hold her - don't squeeze her
never leave her - you've got to
try a little tenderness

With a little help.title: With a little help
With a little help.author: Joe Cocker
With a little help.content:
::Vers::[A]What would you [E]do if I [Bm]sang out of tune,
[E]would you stand [E7]up and walk out on [A]me?
[A]Lend me your [E]ears and I'll [Bm]sing you a song
[E]I will [E7]try not to sing out of [A]key.

::Refräng::[A]Oh, I'm gonna get [G]by with a little 
[D]help from my [A]friends.
I just keep [G]trying, high with a little 
[D]help from my [A]friends.
I wanna get [G]high, high with a little 
[D]help from my [A]friends.
I just [G]hold [D]on with my [A]friends.

::Vers::[A]What do I [E]do when my [Bm]love is away?
[E]Does it [E7]worry you to be a[A]lone?) No no
[A]How do I [E]feel at the [Bm]end of the day?
[E]Are you sad because you're [E7]on your [A]own?
I tell, don't get sad no more

::Refräng::[A]Oh, I'm gonna get [G]by with a little
[D]help from my [A]friends.
I just keep [G]trying, high with a little
[D]help from my [A]friends.
I wanna get [G]high, high with a little
[D]help from my [A]friends.
I just [G]hold [D]on with my [A]friends.

::Bridge::[A]Do you need any[F#m]body?...
I [A]need [G]someone to [A]love.
Could it be [F#m]anybody? 
All I [E]need is someone,
[E7]Lord, I need someone...
I [G]want some[D]body to [A]love.

::Refräng::[A]Oh, I'm gonna get [G]by with a little
[D]help from my [A]friends.
I just keep [G]trying, high with a little
[D]help from my [A]friends.
I wanna get [G]high, high with a little
[D]help from my [A]friends.
I just [G]hold [D]on with my [A]friends.

::Vers::[A]Would you be[E]lieve in a
  [Bm]love at first sight?)
[E]I'm certain it [E7]happens all the [A]time.
[A]What do you [E]see when you
[Bm]turn out the light?
[E]I can't [E7]tell you, 
but it sure feels like [A]mine.

::Refräng::[A]Oh, I'm gonna get [G]by with a little
[D]help from my [A]friends.
I just keep [G]trying, high with a little
[D]help from my [A]friends.
I wanna get [G]high, high with a little

I just [G]hold [D]on with my [A]friends.

::Bridge::[A]Do you need any[F#m]body?...

Could it be [F#m]anybody? 
All I [E]need is someone,
[E7]Lord, I need someone...

[D]help from my [A]friends.
I just keep [G]trying, high with a little

Unchain my heart.title: Unchain my heart
Unchain my heart.author: Joe Cocker
Unchain my heart.content:
::Stick::[Dm]Unchain my heart, [Am]baby let me be[F7]'cause you don't
 [E7]care, so please[Am]set me free

::Vers::[Am]Unchain my heart, baby let me go
[Dm]unchain my heart, 'cause you don't love me no [Am]more
[Dm]every time I call you on the [Am]phone
[Dm]some fellow tells me that you're not at [Am]home
[F7]unchain my [E7]heart, set me [Am]free [D] [Am]

::Vers::[Am]unchain my heart, (unchain my heart) baby let me be
[Dm]unchain my heart, (unchain my heart) 'cause you don't care about [Am]me
[Dm]you got me sewed up like a [Am]pillowcase
[Dm]but you let my love go to [Am]waste
[F7]unchain my [E7]heart, set me [Am]free [D] [Am]

::Bridge::I'm [Dm]under your spell, like a man in a [Am]trance
oh, but you [Dm]know damned well that I don't stand a [E7]chance

[Dm]unchain my heart, (unchain my heart) you worry me night and [Am]day

oh [Am]set me [D]free [Am] .....[D] ....[Am]

you don't [F7]care

Shake a tail feather.title: Shake a tail feather
Shake a tail feather.author: Ray Charles
Shake a tail feather.content:
::Vers::Well I [A7]heard about the fella you've been [D7]dancing with [A7]all over the[D7]neighbourhood,
So [A]why didn't you ask me [F#m]baby? [B7]didn't you think I [E]could
Well I [A]know that the [D]boogaloo is out a sight, but the [A]shingaling's the thing to[D]night,
But if [A]that was you and [F#m]me now, now baby[B7]I would have shown you how to do it [E]right
do it right (ah ha) - do it right ([E7]do it right, do it right,) do it right
[E]Ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh

Do the [A]Twist [D7]Do the [A]Fly [D7]Do the [A]Swim [D7] - Do the [A]Bird [D7]

what about the [D7]boogaloo [A] - Phoney ma[D7]roney [A]

06 - Gimme Some Lovin.title: 06 - Gimme Some Lovin
06 - Gimme Some Lovin.author: The Spencer Davis Group
06 - Gimme Some Lovin.content:
::Vers::Well, my [B]temperature's [E/G]rising and my [B]feet on the [E/G]floor
[B]Twenty people [E/G]knockin 'cause they're [B]wanting some [E/G]more
[B]Let me in baby, [E/G]I don't [B]know what you've [E/G]got
But you'd [B]better take it [E/G]easy, [B]this place is [E/G]hot

::Refräng::[B]So glad we [D]made it, [E]so glad we [G]made it
You gotta [B]gimme some [E/G]lovin', [B]gimme some [E/G]lovin',
[B]Gimme some [E/G]lovin, [B]every day

::Vers::Well, I feel so good everything sounding hot
Better take it easy 'cause the place is on fire
Been a hard day, and I don't know what to do
Wait a minute baby it could happen to you

::Vers::Well, I feel so good, everybody's gettin' high
Better take it easy 'cause the place is on fire
Been a hard day, nothin' went too good,
Now I'm gonna relax, honey, everybody should

08- Give Me One Reason.title: 08- Give Me One Reason
08- Give Me One Reason.author: Tracy Chapman
08- Give Me One Reason.content:
::Vers::[Fm7]Give me one reason to stay here 
[Bbm7]And I'll turnright back around
Give me one reason to stay here
And I'll turn right back around
[Cm7]Because I don't wanna leave you lonely
[Bm7]But you got to make me change my [Fm7]mind

Baby, I got your number
And I know that you got mine
But you know that I called you,
I called too many times
You can call me baby,
you can call me anytime
But you got to call me

Give me one reason to stay here
And I'll turn right back around
Give me one reason to stay here
And I'll turn right back around
Because I don't wanna leave you lonely
But you got to make me change my mind

I don't want no one to squeeze me
They might take away my life
I don't want no one to squeeze me
They might take away my life
I just want someone to hold me
And rock me through the night

09 - Messing with the Kid.title: 09 - Messing with the Kid
09 - Messing with the Kid.author: Blues brother
09 - Messing with the Kid.content:
::Vers::[Bm]What's this I hear There's a whole lotta talk
[Bm]The people say you try to quit the kid
Hey [E]yeah Tell me what you [Bm]did
[F#m]You can call it what you want
[E]But I call it messin' with the [Bm]kid

::Vers::[Bm]Now the kid plays hot, And hot don't pay
[Bm]I say what I mean, I mean what I say
Hey [E]yeah Tell me what you [Bm]did
[F#m]You can call it what you want
[E]But I call it messin' with the kid

[Bm] ... [Bm] ..... [Bm] ......[Bm] ... [E] ....[E] 
.....[Bm] ..... [Bm] ..... [F#m] .......[E] ....[Bm]
::Vers::[Bm]Well tell me you love me, You tell me a lie
[Bm]But I know I love ya baby, 'til the day I die
Hey [E]yeah Tell me what you [Bm]did
[F#m]You can call it what you want
[E]But I call it messin' with the [Bm]kid

[Bm] ...... [Bm] ...... [Bm] .......[Bm] ..... [E] .....[E] .
....[Bm] .. [Bm] ......[F#m] .......[E] .....[Bm] ... [Bm]
::Bridge::Elwood, Elwood! - Yeah?
You wanna mess with the kid?
Nah Jake, I don't wanna mess with the kid.
Yeah I know, I know that. How about you guys back here?
You wanna mess with the kid?
Any of you guys eh?
How about you people out there you wanna mess with the kid?

::Vers::Gonna take the kid's car, Drive around town
Tell everybody trying to put him down
Hey yeah Tell me what you did
You can call it what you want
But I call it messin' with the kid

10 - With a little help ....title: 10 - With a little help ...
10 - With a little help ....author: Joe Cocker
10 - With a little help ....content:
::Vers::[A]What would you [E]do if I sang out of [Bm]tune,
  [E]would you stand [E7]up and walk out on [A]me?
[A]Lend me your [E]ears and I'll sing you a [Bm]song,
[E]I will try [E7]not to sing out of [A]key.


::Refräng::[A]Oh, I'm gonna get [G]by with a little 
[D]help from my [A]friends. 
I just keep trying, [G]high with a little
[D]help from my [A]friends. 
I wanna get high, [G]high with a little 
[D]help from my [A]friends. 
I just hold [G]on [D]with my [A]friends.


::Vers::[A]What do I [E]do when my love is a[Bm]way? 
(Does it [E]worry you to [E7]be a[A]lone?) No no. 
[A]How do I [E]feel at the end of the [Bm]day? 
(Are you [E]sad because you're [E7]on your [A]own?)
I tell, don't get sad no more.

I just keep trying, [G]high with a little 
[D]help from my [A]friends. 
I wanna get high, [G]high with a little

I just hold [G]on [D]with my [A]friends.

Could it be any[F#m]body? 
All I need is [E]someone, 
[E7]Lord, I need someone...I

::Refräng::[A]Oh, I'm gonna get [G]by with a little 
[D]help from my [A]friends. 
I just keep trying, [G]high with a little 
[D]help from my [A]friends. 
I wanna get high, [G]high with a little 
[D]help from my [A]friends. 
I just hold [G]on [D]with my [A]friends.


::Vers::[A](Would you be[E]lieve in a love at first [Bm]sight?)

[E]I can't tell [E7]you, but it sure feels like [A]mine.


::Refräng::[A]Oh, I'm gonna get [G]by with a little 
[D]help from my [A]friends. 
I just keep trying, [G]high with a little
[D]help from my [A]friends. 
I wanna get high, [G]high with a little

All I need is [E]someone, [E7]
Lord, I need someone...

11 - Carry me home.title: 11 - Carry me home
11 - Carry me home.author: Crayons
11 - Carry me home.content:
::Vers::When my [G]time has [D]come..
[Am]and my soul´s flying free[C]
[D].Will you carry [G]me [D]

When the[G]birds singing [D]loud
[Am]but no longer form me[C]
[D].Will you carry [G]me. [D]

When the [G]dust settles [D]down
[Am]on the grave where I lie
[C].Will you carry [G]me. [D]

::Refräng::X2: Will you [G]carry[D/F#] me ....
[B7]will you carry me [G]home. [D]
[C]Will you will you carry me [G]home. [D]

::Solo::[G, D, Am, C, D, G, D]

::Vers::When the waves crashing in
On a faraway shore………
…...Will you carry me. 

When the music is sung
but for me sung no more…
…..Will you carry me. 

When tears have been shed
and my memory roam……
…...Will you carry me. 

::Refräng::X2: 
Will you carry me will you carry me home
Will you will you carry me home 

::Outro::Markeringar och stop

12 - Be good to yourself.title: 12 - Be good to yourself
12 - Be good to yourself.author: Frankie Miller
12 - Be good to yourself.content:
::Vers::[C]Touch me deep inside - 
Baby, I hope it's not a farewell
You can count on me - 
When it's a friend you need
All the same - I hope it all goes well

::Refräng::Now be [C]good to yourself 
Every[D]day and every night
[G]Pick yourself a girl 
Who can de[C]pend to treat you right[G] [F]
[C]Tell the truth to one another
[D]Till your dying day
[G]May the sun shine down your [C]way

::Vers::[C]You know the times we had - been far from bad
And I hope we come together - once again
But until that time - we just say goodbye
I'll remember you till the very end

::Refräng::Now be good to yourself ......
Now be good to yourself ..

[C] ....[D] .....[G] ....[C]
[C]....[D] ....[G]....[C]

::Refräng::Be good to yourself .....
Now be good to yourself....

Let it shine
Ooh

Bad moon rising.title: Bad moon rising
Bad moon rising.author: 16 Horsepower
Bad moon rising.content:
::Verse::[Dm]I see a [C]bad moon [Dm]rising. 
[Dm]I see [C]trouble on the [Dm]way. 
[Dm]I see [C]earthquakes and [Dm]lightning. 
[Dm]I see [C]bad [Gm]times to[Dm]day.

::Chorus::[Gm]Don't go 'round tonight, well it's 
[Dm]bound to take your life. 
[Am]There's a [C]bad moon [Gm]on the [Dm]rise.

::Verse::[Dm]I hear [C]hurricanes a [Dm]blowin'. 
[Dm]I know the [C]end is comin' [Dm]soon. 
[Dm]I feel [C]rivers over[Dm]flowin'. 
[Dm]I hear the [C]voice of [Gm]rage and [Dm]ruin.

::Solo::.
::Chorus::[Gm]Don't go 'round tonight, well it's 
[Dm]bound to take your life.
[Am]There's a [C]bad moon on the [Dm]rise.

::Outro::[Dm]Hope you've got your [C]things to[Dm]gether. 
[Dm]Hope you are [C]quite prepared to [Dm]die. 
[Dm]Looks like we're in for [C]nasty [Dm]weather. 
[Dm]One eye is [C]taken [Gm]for an [Dm]eye.
[Gm]
::Chorus::D[Gm]on't go 'round tonight, well it's 
bo[Dm]und to take your life.
Th[Am]ere's a b[C]ad moon on the ri[Dm]se.

Long train running.title: Long train running
Long train running.author: Doobie Brothers
Long train running.content:
::Vers::[Am7]Down around the corner 
half a mile from here, 
see them long trains run and you 
watch them disappear.

::Refräng::With[Dm7]out love 
where would you be [Am7]now? 
With[F]out  lov[E]e....[Am7].......  

::Vers::[Am7]Though I saw miss lucy 
down along the track, 
she lost her home and her family 
and she won t be coming back.

::Refräng::With[Dm7]out love 
where would you be [Am7]now? 
With[F]out lo[E]ve. ....[Am7]....

::Vers::[Am7]With the Illinois Central 
and the Southern Central freight, 
you got to keep on pushing Mama, 
you know they're running late.

::Refräng::With[Dm7]out love 
where would you be [Am7]now? 
With[F]out lov[E]e... ..[Am7]. 

::Vers::[Am7]When the pistons keep on churning 
and the wheels go round and round, 
and the steel rails are cold and hard 
for the miles that they go down.

::Refräng::With[Dm7]out love 
where would you be [Am7]now? 
With[F]out lo[E]ve, ...[Am7]... 
oohhhhh where would you be..

::Outro::Mo[Am7]ving on. Keep movin on ... ... .

Start me up.title: Start me up
Start me up.author: The Rolling Stones
Start me up.content:
::Intro::..[D]...  .[G x2]...

::Vers::If you s[D]tart me up, 
if you start me up, I'll [G]never stop. 
If you s[D]tart me up, if you start me up,
I'll n[G]ever stop. 

::Vers::I've been r[D]unning hot, 
you got me rifting, gonna [G]blow my top, 
if you st[D]art me up, if you start me up,
I'll never [G]stop. 

::Refräng::[A]You make a grown man [D]cry, 
[A]you make a grown man [D]cry, 
[A]you make a grown man [D]cry! 
[A]Spread out the oil, the gasoline, 
I walk smooth, ride in a 
mean, mean ma[D]chine. [G]

::Vers::[D]Start it up, kick on the starter 
give it all you [G]got, [D]I can't compete 
with the riders in the other [G]seats. 
[D]If you rough it up, if you like it 
you can slide it up, slide it [G]up. 

::Refräng::[A]Don’t make a grown man [D]cry,
[A]don’t make a grown man [D]cry,
[A]don’t make a grown man [D]cry! 
[A]My eyes dilate, my lips go green, 
my hands are greasy, 
she's a mean, mean machine. [G]

::Vers::[D]Start me up, give it all you [G]got!
[D]Start it up, never, never slide it [G]up! 

::Refräng::[A]You make a grown man [D]cry,
[A]you make a grown man [D]cry, 
[A]you make a grown man [D]cry! 
[A]Ride like the wind at double speed, 
I'll take you places that you've 
never, never [D]seen. [G]

::Solo::.
::Vers::[D]Start it up, love the day 
when we will never [G]stop! 
[D]Tough me up, never [G]stop! 

::Refräng::[D]You, you, you make a grown man [G]cry!
[D]You, you make a dead man [G]cum! 
[D]You, you, you make a dead man [G]cum….

To my [A] baby once [F#7] more... anyway?

my way back [E7] home again.

Can't you [G] see I've got to get [D] back,

Hard to handle.title: Hard to handle
Hard to handle.author: Black Crows
Hard to handle.content:
::Verse::[B] Baby, here I am,
I'm a man on the scene. 
I can give you what you want, 
but you gotta come home with me. 

::Verse::[B]I have got some good old lovin', 
and I got some more in store. 
When I get through throwin' it on you, 
you gotta come back for more.

::Refräng::[F#]Boys and things that come 
by the dozen, [F#]that ain't nothin' but 
drugstore lovin'. [B] Hey little thing let me
light your candle, 'cause mama
I'm so hard to handle now. Yes, I am.
.[E]..... [D].... ..[A]... ...[E].. .
::Verse::[B]Action speaks louder than words, 
and I'm a man of great experience. 
I know you've got another man, 
but I can love you better than him.
::Verse::Take my hand don't be afraid, 
I'm gonna prove every word I say. 
I'm advertising love for free, 
so you can place your ad with me.

::Refräng::[F#]Boys – they come along a dime by the dozen, 
that ain't nothing but ten cent lovin'. 
[B] Hey little thing let me light your candle, 
'cause mama I'm sure hard to handle now. 
Yes, I am. 

[A] .... .[E]... ..[B].. Yeah.  
 ..[A]... ..[E].. ...[B]. Hard to handle now. 
  ..[A]... ..[E].. ...[B]. Oh baby. .[A].... ..[E].. ...[B].  

::Verse::[B]Baby, here I am, 
I'm a man on your scene.
I can give you what you want, 
but you gotta come home with me. 

::Verse::I have got some good old lovin', 
and I got some more in store. 
When I get through throwin' it on you, 
you gotta come a runnin back for more.

::Chorus::[F#]Boys – they run along a dime by the dozen, 
[F#]that ain't nothin' but drugstore lovin'. 
[B] Pretty little thing let me light your candle, 
'cause mama I'm so hard to handle now. 
Yes, I am.

  Hard.   Hard to handle now. 
  Oh, yeah, yeah, 
yeah.  

::Solo::Guitar

Boys – they run along a dime by the dozen, 
F#that ain't nothin' but drugstore lovin'. 
B Pretty little thing let me light your candle, 
'cause mama I'm so hard to handle now. 
Yes, I am.


::Outro::[B]Baby, a good lovin', 
[B]baby, baby. [B]Oh, oh, good lovin', 
[B]I need good lovin'. 
[B]I gotta have it, oh, yeah. 
     Yeah, so hard to handle. 
     Yeah.

in[Am]tentions are good

be misunder[Am]stood

'cause I love you

don't you [G]know I'm human

simple thing I've [E]done

in[Am]tentions are good

be misunder[Am]stood

don't [B]you [A]need some[E]body to [F#m]love, 
wouldn't [B]you [A]love some[E]body to [F#m]love,

::Bridge::Your [F#m]eyes, I say your eyes may look like [B]his. 
Yeah, but in your head, 
[F#m]baby, I'm a[E]fraid you don't know where it [F#m]is. [B]

don't [B]you [A]need some[E]body to [F#m]love, 
wouldn't [B]you [A]love some[E]body to [F#m]love,

::Verse::[F#m]Tears are running [B]down, 
they're all [E]running down your [F#m]breast, [B]
 [E] and your [F#m]friends, baby, 
[B]they treat [E]you like a [F#m]guest. [B]

::Outro::Don't you [A]want some[E]body to [F#m]love,

Love me 2 times.title: Love me 2 times
Love me 2 times.author: The Doors
Love me 2 times.content:
::Verse::Love me two times baby, love me twice today.

 [D7]Love me two times girl, [C7]last me all through the week.

::Refräng::[G]Love me two [D7]times, [C7] I'm g[B7]oin' a[Em7]way.

Rohouse Blues.title: Rohouse Blues
Rohouse Blues.author: The Doors
Rohouse Blues.content:
Instrument: Organ Tonart:
D moll Transpose Keys: +7 eller -5 

::Vers::Keep your ey[Dm]es on the road
Your hand upon the wheel
Keep your eyes on the road 
Your hand upon the wheel 
Yeah, we're going to the Roadhouse
Gonna have a real ....Good time

 (Instrumentalt)

::Vers::Yeah, the bac[Dm]k of the Roadhouse 
They got some bungalows
Yeah, the back of the Roadhouse 
They got some bungalows 
And that's for the people 
Who like to go down slow

::Refräng::Let it r[G]oll, baby, roll - 
Let it roll, baby, roll
Let it roll, baby, roll
[G7]- Let it roll [A7]---- [A#7]-----
A[A7]ll night l[D]ong 
Do it, Robbie, do it 

::Bridge::You gotta roll, roll, roll
You gotta thrill my soul, alright 
Roll, roll, roll, roll, a-thrill my soul 
You gotta beep a gunk a chucha 
Honk konk konk kadanta.
Each ya puna ney cha
Bap pa lula ni chao Pao pati cha
Ni saong kong. Yeah, ride
Ashen lady - Ashen lady
Give up your vows - Give up your vows. 
Save our city - Save our city - Right now

::Vers::Well, I woke up this mornin' - And I got myself a beer 
Well, I woke up this mornin' - And I got myself a beer 
The future's uncertain - And the end is always near 

::Refräng::Let it roll, baby, roll - Let it roll, baby, roll - 
Let it roll, baby, roll - Let it roll - All night long

Peace Frog.title: Peace Frog
Peace Frog.author: The Doors
Peace Frog.content:
::Chorus::Th[Gm]ere's blood in the streets 
it's [C]up to my [Bb]ankles, [Gm]
blood in the streets it's [C]up to my [Bb]knee; 
[Gm]blood in the streets, the 
[C]town of Chi[Bb]cago. [Gm]
Blood on the rise, it's [C]following [Bb]me.  [Gm]......[C]...[Bb]....              
[Gm]Just about the break of [C]day. [Bb] 
[Em]She came, then she drove a[G]way, 
[F#m]sunlight in her [A]hair.
::Verse::[Gm]Blood on the streets runs a [C]
river of [Bb]sadness. [G][m]Blood in the streets, 
it's [C]up to my [Bb]thigh. 
[Gm]The river runs down the [C]legs of the [Bb]city; 
[Gm]the women are crying red [C]rivers of [Bb]weeping. 
[Em]She came in town and then she drove a[G]way, 
[F#m]sunlight in her [A]hair.[Ab]

x6 In[Gm]dians scattered on dawn's highway. 
Bleeding ghosts crowd the young 
childs fragile eggshell mind[D7].


::Chorus::[Gm]Blood in the streets of the [C]town of New 
[Bb]Haven; [Gm]blood stains the roofs 
and the [C]palm trees of [Bb]Venice. 
[Gm]Blood in my love in the [C]terrible [Bb]summer; 

[Gm] ........[C].......[Bb]...........[Gm]...     
Bloody red sun of fan
[C]tastic L.[Bb]A. ....[Gm]........[C].....[Bb].....[Gm]....     
Blood screams her brain a
s they [C]chop off her [Bb]fingers. [Gm]
Blood will be born in the [C]birth of a [Bb]nation; 
[Gm]blood is the rose of mys[C]terious [Bb]union. [Gm] [C] [Bb]

Outro
[Gm]There's blood in the streets 
it's [C]up to my [Bb]ankles, 
[Gm]blood in the streets it's [C]up to my [Bb]knee; 
[Gm]blood in the streets, the [C]town of Chi[Bb]cago. 
[Gm]Blood on the rise, it's [C]following [Bb]me. [Gm]........[C]......[Fmaj7].
